target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002700_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ich werde sie mir alle einverleiben. Der Wille einer Welt reicht nicht aus, doch wenn man mehrere bündelt<var 1D /var>... So könnte man <var 08 E905 ((die Kriegerin)) ((den Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit besiegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though it pains me to disappoint you, I feel compelled to explain that the magick in question requires no small amount of preparation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du beherrschst diese Magie nicht. Das wird dir niemals gelingen, Ascian!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002720_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ah, but you assume I require my champions to be summoned in their entirety. I do not. Their souls needn't even be whole.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002720_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ich muss sie ja nicht vollständig rufen. Ihre Seelen reichen mir. Ein unvollständiger Transport wie bei diesen Exegeten wird meinen Zwecken vollkommen genügen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002730_ELIDIBUS<tab>My purpose requires no more than their burning desire to vanquish evil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002730_ELIDIBUS<tab>Seelen, getrieben von dem Willen, das Böse zu bezwingen - man bräuchte sie nur für einen Augenblick in den Äther dieser Welt zu brennen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002740_ELIDIBUS<tab>This I shall sear upon the aether, raising thereby an army of phantom heroes, to whom I shall whisper, as I have to so many over the ages...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002740_ELIDIBUS<tab>Hjahaha<var 1D /var>... Dann könnte ich ihnen ihre Aufgabe einflüstern und sie für mich gewinnen. So wie ich es seit hundert, nein, hunderttausend Jahren tue<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002750_ELIDIBUS<tab>“Here lies darkness. It must be destroyed.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002750_ELIDIBUS<tab>„Hier entlang, meine mutigen Retter. Vernichtet die Schergen der Dunkelheit<var 1D /var>...“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And you expect me to cooperate?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und du glaubst, dass ich dir dabei helfe?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002770_ELIDIBUS<tab>I do not require your cooperation. Your death will suffice. The magick, I shall have from your corpse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002770_ELIDIBUS<tab>Oh, nein. Du? Du musst einfach nur sterben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002780_BEQLUGG<tab>Go, Lugus!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002780_BEQLUGG<tab>Greif an, Lugus!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002790_BEQLUGG<tab>We must flee!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002790_BEQLUGG<tab>Schnell! Flieh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002800_BEQLUGG<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002800_BEQLUGG<tab>Uah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002810_ELIDIBUS<tab>...But what is this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002810_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ooh.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)Argh... Unnngh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)A-aaah<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My friend... How did you...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du<var 1D /var>... hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No matter... Elidibus... He took us unawares...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wir<var 1D /var>... wurden von Elidibus überrascht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Argh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002860_BEQLUGG<tab>It was all we could do...to raise a ward to hinder his steps... And so we fled...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002860_BEQLUGG<tab>Wir hatten keine Chance gegen ihn<var 1D /var>... Wir konnten gerade so<var 1D /var>... eine Barriere errichten<var 1D /var>... und uns mit einem Transportzauber retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002870_BEQLUGG<tab>But he took it... The vessel with the Exarch's memories...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002870_BEQLUGG<tab>Aber das Gefäß<var 1D /var>... Die Erinnerungen<var 1D /var>... hat jetzt er.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002880_BEQLUGG<tab>Forgive me... Forgive me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002880_BEQLUGG<tab>Es tut mir leid<var 1D /var>... Es tut mir so leidlich-leid<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The vessel bears not only my memories, but my blood─the blood of Allagan royalty...granting him the means to control the tower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du weißt, was das bedeutet? Mit meinem Blut und meinen Erinnerungen gebietet Elidibus nun über den Turm<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With it, he has performed I know not how many summonings, calling forth heroes from across the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Er<var 1D /var>... Er ruft die Helden anderer Welten herbei, um dich in die Knie zu zwingen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And as you can see, the burden upon the tower is beginning to tell...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Der Turm wehrt sich. Ich höre seine klagenden Rufe. Und hier, sieh, was es mit mir macht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Leave him to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Überlass das mir. Ich bitte dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm just glad you're alive. Make sure you stay that way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du musst am Leben bleiben, hörst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No. I won't let you go alone. Not this time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nein. Das kann ich nicht zulassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If you mean to face him alone, I will not allow it. Not this time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ach<var 1D /var>... Wenn es nur<var 1D /var>... so einfach wäre<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Urgh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Elidibus has exploited the people's nobility. Twisted their purest intentions for terrible ends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Träume, Hoffnungen und der Mut, füreinander einzustehen<var 1D /var>... Elidibus will all das für seine üblen Zwecke missbrauchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And I cannot let it stand. As Exarch, it is my duty to protect them. To defend their hopes and dreams.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich muss ihn aufhalten. Ich bin der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch. Diese Welt und ihre Bewohner, sie stehen unter meinem Schutz!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So I'm going to the Crystal Tower, with or without your blessing─though I would rather it were with.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bring mich zum Turm<var 1D /var>... Bitte. Es muss sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich danke dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002990_BEQLUGG<tab>I'd join you...but I would only be a burden. Better that I remain here with my gremlins...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_002990_BEQLUGG<tab>Ich kann kaum mehr meine Pfoten heben<var 1D /var>... Lasst mich einfach hier liegen. Sollen die Gremlins sich einen schmackhaften Schmaus aus mir machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I shall send help. Stay strong, my friend, and take heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mitnichten, werter Beq Lugg. Wir holen sofort Hilfe. Sei stark und warte auf uns.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>By binding Elidibus within the tower, we have done more than simply delay him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wir werden Elidibus im Turm stellen und er wird merken, dass er sich den falschen Ort in Norvrandt ausgesucht hat, um sein finsteres Werk zu vollenden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Much like our adversary, I am not wont to show my hand prematurely. But the time has come to bring my strongest card to bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich sagte doch, dass ich unsere Trümpfe nicht zu früh ausspielen möchte. Die höchste Karte behalte ich für das Finale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To the tower!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Also los. Auf zum Turm.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Not here either. We must keep climbing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hier ist er auch nicht<var 1D /var>... Los, suchen wir weiter oben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ngh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ng-ngaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Twas but a matter of time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Heh. Er hat uns entdeckt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I cannot keep up with you. Nor will it avail us to make a stand here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mit meinem Bein halte ich dich nur auf. Je länger wir brauchen, desto mehr Energie entzieht er dem Turm<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You must go on without me. Find Elidibus, and stop him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Geh! Finde den Dämon und schaff ihn aus dieser Welt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Worry not, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Um mich<var 1D /var>... brauchst du dir<var 1D /var>... argh<var 1D /var>... brauchst du dir keine Sorgen zu machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though I am no warrior, I have learned to hold my own over the years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dir kann ich zwar nicht das Wasser reichen, aber ich bin noch nicht am Ende. Schließlich hatte ich viel, viel Zeit, um mich vorzubereiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When first we explored this tower, you and your fellow adventurers formed the van, while I was left to follow in your wake.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Weißt du noch, wie ihr den Turm erforscht habt? Mutigen Schrittes seid ihr vorangestürmt<var 1D /var>... Und ich? Ich war noch nicht so weit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Suffice it to say, I was not best pleased with the arrangement. How I wished that I could join you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Damals ging es nicht anders, aber wie oft habe ich mir gewünscht, dass ich dich hätte begleiten können!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And now I have, here where it all began.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch hier und jetzt geht dieser Wunsch nach einem gemeinsamen Abenteuer in Erfüllung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I was right to trust in you and the power of your legacy─of your name. To let them guide my every deed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Was bin ich froh, dass ich mein Vertrauen in dich gelegt habe. Dass ich mich von der Hoffnung habe leiten lassen, die dein Name in sich birgt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003160_ELIDIBUS<tab>For Elidibus is my name. And my mission. Guiding my every deed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003160_ELIDIBUS<tab>Elidibus - Dieser Name<var 1D /var>... dieser Titel ist alles, was ich habe<var 1D /var>... alles, was ich bin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Warum gerade ich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Did you never consider other paths?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Kam es dir nie in den Sinn, ein anderes Leben zu führen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Why you? Why <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> you? Had I chosen another, we would never have made it this far. Or do I mistake your meaning...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Warum? Hatte ich das nicht schon erklärt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I did─but I chose not to walk them, thank the gods. Why ever would you ask me such a thing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch. Und trotzdem blieb mir keine Wahl. Aber<var 1D /var>... müssen wir hier und jetzt darüber sprechen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Elidibus spoke in similar terms, you say? How curious.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Elidibus hat etwas Ähnliches gesagt? Erstaunlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To answer your question, then, I made my choice for reasons which seemed obvious to me, but may not to any other.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn ich eine Antwort finden müsste, würde ich sagen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>There were the expectations I placed upon myself before beginning my slumber. And the expectations of those who roused me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>... vielleicht weil ich dir ein Versprechen gab, bevor ich mich zur Ruhe legte, mich mit dir verbunden fühlte. Oder vielleicht, weil diejenigen, die mich erweckten, es so wollten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Of course, I had the choice to turn my back on the lot of it. But in the end, it was no choice at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sicher, niemand hat mich gezwungen, so zu handeln, und doch habe ich mich stets danach gerichtet<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I cherish the time I spent with you and the others. What I wouldn't give to return to those halcyon days...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es war mir jedenfalls eine Freude, die eine oder andere Strophe zu deinem Heldenlied dazuzudichten, ja sogar Teil davon zu sein<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Chasing ancient secrets, overcoming trial after trial with the aid of like-minded comrades...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vor mir entfaltete sich eine seit tausenden Jahren geheim gehaltene Wahrheit. Ein schweres Erbe. Aber immer hatte ich Freunde an meiner Seite, die mir beistanden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And what remarkable comrades they were. In such company, I felt as if I were a character in the epic tales that had stirred my heart as a boy. As if my dream had come true...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und ein jeder von ihnen ist Teil meiner Erinnerungen. Das hat mir mehr Mut gemacht als jede ruhmreiche Heldengeschichte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It hadn't, of course, for I was no hero. Neither then nor after. Though the world to which I awakened, and the First were beset with myriad problems, I rarely knew how best to play my part.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Damals wie heute<var 1D /var>... ist so viel geschehen, stand so viel auf dem Spiel<var 1D /var>... Nicht selten fiel es mir schwer, den rechten Pfad zu erkennen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>There was, however, one thing of which I was certain: that I could not bear to let those dear to me meet a tragic end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber allem zum Trotz habe ich niemals ans Aufgeben gedacht, nie einen Gedanken ans Scheitern verschwendet. Weil ich meine Freunde an meiner Seite wusste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I'm afraid our time is up. Go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Zeit ist gekommen. Ich halte dir den Rücken frei. Geh allein weiter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003290_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Rest assured you haven't seen the last of me. I wouldn't dream of playing my trump card save in your presence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003290_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Keine Sorge, ich bin dir dicht auf den Fersen. Und dann werde ich einen Trumpf ausspielen, der auch dich verblüffen wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Break!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Gewicht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003310_ELIDIBUS<tab>Memories of a possible future...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003310_ELIDIBUS<tab>Erinnerungen an eine Zukunft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003320_ELIDIBUS<tab>Worthless, all. Worthless as memories of the only past. Fated to fray and fade into oblivion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003320_ELIDIBUS<tab>Wertlos. Sind sie doch nicht mehr als eine weitere Ver<var 16 /var>gangen<var 16 /var>heit. Verdammt dazu, im Herzen zu verblassen, zu verschwinden<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003330_ELIDIBUS<tab>Leaving naught but a gaping void...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003330_ELIDIBUS<tab>Aber ist es bei mir nicht genauso?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003340_ELIDIBUS<tab>The Waking...Sands? ...Yes, that was the place. The place I first made myself known to you and yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003340_ELIDIBUS<tab>Erinnerst du dich an unsere erste Begegnung? Es war in eurem Hauptquartier, im<var 1D /var>... Sonnenwind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003350_ELIDIBUS<tab>The seventh Rejoining had left the realm listing dangerously towards Darkness. And events were unfolding that threatened to push it over the brink.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003350_ELIDIBUS<tab>Die Siebte Katastrophe war noch frisch in den Erinnerungen der Bewohner und das verwüstete Eorzea stand kurz davor, vollends im Chaos der Dunkelheit zu versinken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003360_ELIDIBUS<tab>Thus did I approach you, in my capacity as Emissary, thinking that you would make a useful pawn...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003360_ELIDIBUS<tab>Also habe ich, der Fürsprecher, dich ausgewählt. Ich hoffte, dass du eine verlässliche Figur auf meinem Spielbrett sein würdest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003370_ELIDIBUS<tab>But I was wrong, and for my misstep did Lahabrea and Emet-Selch pay the ultimate price. Leaving me the last of the unsundered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003370_ELIDIBUS<tab>Doch es kam anders. Lahabrea und Emet-Selch fielen meiner Sorglosigkeit zum Opfer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003380_ELIDIBUS<tab>My remaining brethren, fragmented as they are, cannot hope to see our mission to its end. It falls to me alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003380_ELIDIBUS<tab>Nun bin ich der Letzte der Ursprünglichen. Die anderen meiner Art sind unvollkommen. Was kann man sich von ihnen schon erwarten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003390_ELIDIBUS<tab>Defeat is not an option. I will strike you down. I will resurrect Lord Zodiark. And I will bring back those who sacrificed themselves to call Him forth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003390_ELIDIBUS<tab>Aber mich kann kein Gespaltener besiegen. Ich werde dir hier und jetzt ein Ende bereiten. Ich werde Zodiark wiederauferstehen lassen und dem Gestirn das wahre Leben zurückgeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003400_ELIDIBUS<tab>Though it take a thousand thousand years, upon my honor as Elidibus, Emissary of the Convocation of Fourteen, I will see this done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003400_ELIDIBUS<tab>Mag es auch hundert oder hundert mal hundert Jahre dauern<var 1D /var>... Ich, Elidibus, der Fürsprecher vom Konvent der Vierzehn, werde es vollbringen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003410_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But know that his devotion is not without reason. Even if he himself can no longer remember what that reason is.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003410_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Aber er hat seine Beweggründe. Selbst wenn er sich nicht mehr entsinnen kann, welche es waren.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003420_LAHABREA<tab>(-Convocation Speaker-)<var 48 F20223 /var>You worry too much, Elidibus. This dedication to your duty verges on obsession.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003420_LAHABREA<tab>(-Anführer des Konvents-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Du bist wirklich ein Pedant. Na ja, ich sollte dich wohl eher loben, dass du dein Amt so ernst nimmst.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Those who once relied upon you are no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Fürsprecher? Aber für wen? Elidibus, sie sind alle fort!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>However hard you struggle, you will never bring back the Convocation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Der Konvent der Vierzehn ist nicht mehr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003440_ELIDIBUS<tab>What of it!? I have my mission!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003440_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ha, leere Worte! Glaubst du etwa, ich lasse von meinem Plan ab, nur weil ich alleine bin?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003450_ELIDIBUS<tab>I am Elidibus! And it is my duty to steer mankind and the very star upon their true course. This I swore to...to someone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003450_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ich bin Elidibus. Der Mittler zwischen dem Gestirn und seinen Bewohnern. Darauf habe ich einen Schwur<var 1D /var>... einen Schwur<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003460_ELIDIBUS<tab>We spoke, and I swore...what? What did I...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003460_ELIDIBUS<tab>Doch<var 1D /var>... Wem? Wem habe ich<var 1D /var>... Und was habe ich geschworen?! Ich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003470_ELIDIBUS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003470_ELIDIBUS<tab>Hm<var 1D /var>... Hm, hahaha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003480_ELIDIBUS<tab>This pain, this torment...is nothing! No more than must be suffered to deliver the world from its doom! No more than any of you malformed creatures have known!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003480_ELIDIBUS<tab>Was ist das für ein Schmerz!<var 1D /var>... Ist es nicht das, wovon ihr in euren Liedern singt? Das Leid, die Trauer, welche die Last unserer Aufgabe in unsere Herzen presst?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003490_ELIDIBUS<tab>Even should you lose all that is dear to you. Even should it cost you your life...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003490_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ja, auch ich habe viel verloren - manchmal kostete es mich gar das eigene Leben<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003500_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>Even should you lose all that is dear to you. Even should it cost you your life...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003500_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>Ja, auch ich habe viel verloren - manchmal kostete es mich gar das eigene Leben<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003510_ELIDIBUS<tab>You bear the burden and fight on, kicking and screaming until your last breath is spent!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003510_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ich trug sie, diese Last! Klaglos, unermüdlich! Was ist falsch daran?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003520_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>You bear the burden and fight on, kicking and screaming until your last breath is spent!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003520_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>Ich trug sie, diese Last! Klaglos, unermüdlich! Was ist falsch daran?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-Voice from Within-)Aye, it's true. We've lost much and more. Known unimaginable suffering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-Widerhall in deiner Seele-)Ja, es ist wahr<var 1D /var>... Wir haben viel verloren. Sooo unendlich viel verloren<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-Voice from Within-)But through it all, we never, ever forgot what was dear to us. And that's what gave us the strength to carry on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-Widerhall in deiner Seele-)Und doch behielten wir unser Ziel immer im Auge, vergaßen nie für wen wir kämpften. Wir taten, was getan werden musste<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Elidibus...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Elidibus<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You've no fight left to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Es ist aus. Es gibt nichts mehr, wofür du kämpfen kannst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will put an end to this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Bringen wir es zu Ende. Hier und jetzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003550_ELIDIBUS<tab>No! NO! It will not end here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003550_ELIDIBUS<tab>Wie kannst du es wagen, <var 08 E905 ((Unvollkommene)) ((Unvollkommener)) /var>?! Nein! Gar nichts ist zu Ende!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003560_ELIDIBUS<tab>Champions from beyond the rift, heed my call! The time is come to deliver your brethren from darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003560_ELIDIBUS<tab>Hört mich, o Helden aller Splitter, die ihr die Waffen in die Hand nahmt, um eure Welten vor dem Untergang zu bewahren!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003570_ELIDIBUS<tab>My heart's sole desire is a world free of sorrow. Join with me now in hope and prayer...for the salvation of all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003570_ELIDIBUS<tab>Folgt mir, denn mein Weg führt uns in eine Zukunft ohne Trauer! <var 1A 02 /var>Wir<var 1A 01 /var> sind die Erfüllung aller Wünsche<var 1D /var>... all jener, die euch am Herzen liegen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003580_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)If you would usher in the end, then with my all shall I oppose you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003580_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)Wenn du denkst, dass du mich aufhalten kannst, werde ich dich eines Besseren belehren!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003590_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)...As the avatar of those mortal heroes who fought unfalteringly, in all their imperfection! As the Warrior of Light incarnate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003590_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)Ihr namenlosen Helden, die ihr euch erhoben habt, um eurem Schicksal entgegenzutreten, heute sind wir eins! Wir sind der Krieger des Lichts!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003600_ELIDIBUS<tab>Come, Warrior of Darkness! Let us finish this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003600_ELIDIBUS<tab>Das ist dein Ende, <var 08 E905 ((Kriegerin)) ((Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003610_ELIDIBUS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003610_ELIDIBUS<tab>なっ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003620_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Herein I commit the chronicle of the traveler. Shepherd to the stars in the dark.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003620_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Das eigene Leben darbietend und mit den Sternen vereint, sendest du eine Botschaft an alle, die wir lieben und ehren.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003630_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Though the world be sundered and our souls set adrift, where you walk, my dearest friend, fate shall surely follow.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003630_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Auch wenn die Welt zerstört und unsere Seelen versprengt sind, hast du die Gabe, unser Schicksal zu einen.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003640_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>For yours is the Fourteenth seat─the seat of Azem.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003640_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Dein ist der vierzehnte Sitz. Dein Titel sei<var 1D /var>... <var 1A 02 /var>Azem<var 1A 01 /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003650_ELIDIBUS<tab>An invocation of eld...though not of Hydaelyn's making... What are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003650_ELIDIBUS<tab>Das Wissen der Vorzeit<var 1D /var>... aber dies ist nicht Hydaelyns Werk<var 1D /var>... Wer bist du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003660_ELIDIBUS<tab>No─it matters not! You are the enemy, and you will fall! Even should it cost me everything, I will not forsake my duty!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003660_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ach, es spielt keine Rolle. Ich werde nun den Schlussstrich ziehen, und zwar mit dieser Klinge!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003670_ELIDIBUS<tab>Fool! You have achieved nothing! I am immortal, and I will never surrender!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003670_ELIDIBUS<tab>Spar dir deine Geringschätzung! Dieser Kampf ist noch nicht vorbei<var 1D /var>... Du kannst einen Unsterblichen nicht besiegen<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003680_ELIDIBUS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003680_ELIDIBUS<tab>Wa-?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Elidibus. So fixated were you on my memories of the future, you failed to heed the lessons of the past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hab ich dich! Du hättest dich vielleicht nicht nur meiner Erinnerungen an die Zukunft widmen sollen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your obsession blinded you to the true nature of this tower─this beacon of hope for mankind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du hast außer Acht gelassen, dass dieser Turm schon immer ein Symbol der Hoffnung war!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Created to serve as a reservoir for the limitless energy of the heavens! To harness and bind the boundless─not unlike white auracite!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Allager schufen ihn, um die Kraft des Himmels aufzunehmen. <var 1A 02 /var>Dies<var 1A 01 /var> ist der größte jemals geschaffene weiße Auracit!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your ill-begotten power, obtained by exploiting that which is best in us... I shall have it, your soul and all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Diese Kraft, die du verächtlich aus den Herzen all dieser treuen Helden stahlst<var 1D /var>... sie ist nicht länger dein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003730_ELIDIBUS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003730_ELIDIBUS<tab>GuaaAAaaah<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003740_ELIDIBUS<tab>This...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003740_ELIDIBUS<tab>Das ist doch<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003750_ELIDIBUS<tab>Yes... I would become Him. I would save everyone. This I believed. Yet still they cried out, in rage and despair...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003750_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ich dachte, ich könnte die Meinen retten, wenn ich mich Zodiark hingeben würde. Ich opferte alles für dieses eine Ziel<var 1D /var>... Aber das Leid meines Volkes sollte nicht enden. Das Wehklagen nicht verstummen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003760_ELIDIBUS<tab>Divided─over the fate of the star. A rare occurrence, always fleeting. But not this time. Not this time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003760_ELIDIBUS<tab>Die Zukunft der Welt hing in der Schwebe und Chaos machte sich breit. Die Ascians waren zutiefst gespalten. Der Konvent uneins<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003770_ELIDIBUS<tab>Reconciliation. Elidibus. I was needed. I withdrew myself from Zodiark. For them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003770_ELIDIBUS<tab>Elidibus, der Fürsprecher, musste etwas tun. Ich musste etwas tun. Und so spaltete ich mich wieder von Zodiark ab<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003780_ELIDIBUS<tab>My people. My brothers. ...My friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003780_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ich liebte sie. Jeden einzelnen. Sie alle waren meine Brüder und Schwestern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003790_ELIDIBUS<tab>Stay strong. Keep the faith. At duty's end, we will meet again. We will. We will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003790_ELIDIBUS<tab>Ich dachte, wenn ich meine Aufgabe erfülle, könnte ich sie wiedersehen. Noch einmal in ihre glücklichen Gesichter blicken. Endlich wissen, dass der Albtraum enden würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003800_ELIDIBUS<tab>The rains have ceased, and we have been graced with another beautiful day. But you are not here to see it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003800_ELIDIBUS<tab>Es ist vorbei<var 1D /var>... Alles verloren<var 1D /var>... Ich bin der Letzte<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I concede, I may have overexerted myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Glänzend<var 1D /var>... nicht wahr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Steady now, and listen. I told you before that I had a plan, and that when all was said and done, I would ask a favor of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich habe zu guter Letzt alles erreicht, was ich mir als Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch vorgenommen hatte. Erstaunlich, nicht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We have averted the Eighth Umbral Calamity. Found a way for everyone to return to the Source, and...last but not least, we have secured the future of all the people of Norvrandt. We have won, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Achte Katastrophe verhindern<var 1D /var>... Einen Weg für euch zurück nach Hause finden<var 1D /var>... Den guten Leuten von Norvrandt helfen<var 1D /var>... Ja, plötzlich scheint nichts mehr unerreichbar.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So I hope you'll forgive me this moment of selfishness. And...while I wouldn't want you to feel obliged...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich habe noch eine Bitte<var 1D /var>... auch wenn es lächerlich wirken mag<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Promise me you'll take me on your next adventure. A journey. Together. That's all I ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)Ich will<var 1D /var>... Ich will mit dir auf Reisen gehen. Dein nächstes Abenteuer miterleben. Und all jene, die folgen mögen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I promise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich verspreche es dir, G'raha Tia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You could've asked me earlier!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Warum nur bittest du mich erst jetzt darum<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hehe. Hm-hmpf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If I were to tell you that this isn't the end─that we will meet again─would you believe me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)Du glaubst<var 1D /var>... doch auch daran, dass wir uns wiedersehen<var 1D /var>... oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)Danke<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My friend. With you, my mind and memories shall travel to the ends of the world and beyond. But in this place shall my body stand immovable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)Meine Seele, meine Erinnerungen<var 1D /var>... Sie liegen nun in deinen fähigen Händen. Lass meinen Körper<var 1D /var>... ein schillerndes Denkmal sein<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>May it serve as an undying promise, not only to those who looked to me for leadership, but to any soul who has known despair, that hope is everlasting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)Soll er sie an ihre Träume erinnern und ihnen Hoffnung auf eine bessere Zukunft spenden - all die guten Leute, die mich den Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen nannten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003910_RYNE<tab>There the Exarch would remain, keeping his silent vigil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003910_RYNE<tab>So begann der Exarch seine stille Wache über den ersten Splitter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003920_RYNE<tab>When the Scions were not released from his summoning spell, we proceeded with the plan to return them to the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003920_RYNE<tab>Und wie der Barde, Forscher und Königssohn es sich wünschte, diente er jedem, der ihn sah, als strahlende Erinnerung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003930_RYNE<tab>The Warrior of Darkness, however, retained <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> ability to traverse the two worlds at will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003930_RYNE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Der Heldin)) ((Dem Helden)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> zwischen den Welten reiste, war er ein Leuchtfeuer, auf dass <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> sich nicht zwischen den Dimensionen verlor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003940_RYNE<tab>And in time the Crystal Tower became a symbol of his link to the First─and of hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003940_RYNE<tab>Der Kristallturm - die Brücke über den Riss der Dimensionen - stand stolz in alle Ewigkeit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003950_RYNE<tab>And in time the Crystal Tower became a symbol of her link to the First─and of hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003950_RYNE<tab>Der Kristallturm - die Brücke über den Riss der Dimensionen - stand stolz in alle Ewigkeit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003960_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh... Oh, Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003960_DULIACHAI<tab>Uaahaaa<var 1D /var>... Buhuuu<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Please, Lady Chai, dry your eyes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Werte Frau Chai, bitte, so beruhigt Euch doch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003980_DULIACHAI<tab>The thought of never seeing you again... It's more than my poor heart can bear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003980_DULIACHAI<tab>Ich will mich aber nicht beruhigen. Der Abschied von dir, meinem liebsten Alphinaud, zerreißt mir das Herz!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003990_DULIACHAI<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003990_DULIACHAI<tab>Uhuhuuu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004000_CHAINUZZ<tab>Oh, it's you. As you can see, Alphinaud has broken the news.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004000_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ach, du bist es<var 1D /var>... Wie du siehst, hat meine Frau die Neuigkeit von Alphinaud nicht gerade leicht hingenommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004010_CHAINUZZ<tab>I don't know how to console her. She thinks we'll be lost without him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004010_CHAINUZZ<tab>Die Ärmste ist völlig außer sich<var 1D /var>... Und ich weiß einfach nicht, wie ich ihr helfen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're certainly well loved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du wirst offensichtlich geliebt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Make sure you leave nothing unsaid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Na los, sag, was dir auf dem Herzen liegt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>A picture paints a thousand words!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Großer Maler, verabschiede dich in Würde!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004020_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis more than I deserve. Yet I am truly grateful, and will see that she knows as much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich fühle mich durchaus geschmeichelt. Hoffentlich finde ich die richtigen Worte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, my friend. Nothing unsaid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... das werde ich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004040_ALPHINAUD<tab>You'll never let me forget it, will you. I'll have you know I completed the promised painting in the end. Be that as it may, there are times only words will suffice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja, mein Werk ist vollbracht. Jetzt fehlen nur noch die richtigen Worte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lady Chai, I have a confession to make.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Frau Chai, bitte hört mir zu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004060_ALPHINAUD<tab>On the day we ousted Lord Vauthry, when I revealed the truth of his tyranny and your complicity in his crimes, I did so with great trepidation. Not out of fear that you wouldn't listen, but that you might never recover.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Einst gründete ich eine Gemeinschaft mit dem noblen Ziel, Gutes zu tun. Doch dabei unterliefen mir schwerwiegende Fehler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004070_ALPHINAUD<tab>There was a time when I too, in my hubris, believed myself worthy to lord it over others. And when the lie was laid bare─when I was forced to confront the cost, the lives lost─it all but destroyed me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fehler, für die andere mit ihren Leben bezahlten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004080_ALPHINAUD<tab>To awaken from a naive dream to so harsh a reality... I would have understood had you all surrendered to despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Als ich sah, wie Vauthry ohne Rücksicht auf Verluste seine Vorstellung von einer perfekten Welt verwirklichen wollte<var 1D /var>... da erkannte ich einen Teil meiner selbst in ihm.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004090_ALPHINAUD<tab>But you didn't surrender. Far from it. You picked yourselves up and rose to the challenge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Deshalb hat es mich besonders gefreut, dass diese Stadt einen Neuanfang geschafft hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004100_ALPHINAUD<tab>You found a path forward and the strength to walk it─and to keep walking it─day after day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Damit ist meine eigene Schuld nicht beglichen, aber es hat mir gezeigt, dass man sich immer wieder aufrichten kann, egal wie tief der Fall auch gewesen sein mag. Das hat mir Mut gemacht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004110_ALPHINAUD<tab>But what struck me is how much faster you found it than I did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mit neuer Hoffnung im Herzen will auch ich nach vorn blicken und meinen Weg gehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004120_CHAINUZZ<tab>...Really? It felt pretty slow to me! But rest assured, we'll make Eulmore into a nation anyone would be proud to call home...eventually.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004120_CHAINUZZ<tab>Sei versichert, dass wir keine Mühen scheuen werden, um Eulmore zu einer guten Stadt zu machen. Einer gerechten Stadt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004130_CHAINUZZ<tab>You can still come and go as you please, I believe? When we have good tidings to report, I may trouble you to be their bearer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004130_CHAINUZZ<tab>Du wirst weiter unsere Welt besuchen können, nicht wahr? Wenn es Neuigkeiten zu berichten gibt, werden wir dir einen Brief mitgeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004140_CHAINUZZ<tab>There may also be less-than-good tidings...in which event, I hope I can trouble you for your counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004140_CHAINUZZ<tab>Vermutlich werden es nicht immer nur gute Neuigkeiten sein<var 1D /var>... In diesem Fall hoffe ich, dass wir auch weiterhin auf deinen wertvollen Rat zählen können, Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004150_ALPHINAUD<tab>I should be honored to provide it, Master Chai.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber selbst<var 16 /var>verständ<var 16 /var>lich! Ich bin Euch jederzeit wieder gerne zu Diensten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004160_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, Alphinaud... I know you aren't one to sit still, but do remember to take your ease from time to time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004160_DULIACHAI<tab>Alphinaud, du hast schon so viel für uns getan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004170_DULIACHAI<tab>And no matter where you are, remember that there are people here who are praying for your health and happiness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004170_DULIACHAI<tab>Wir werden immer an dich denken und für dich beten. Auf dass dein Leben voller Frieden und Freude sein möge.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004180_DULIACHAI<tab>Our brave and gentle artist. You have our love, now and always.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004180_DULIACHAI<tab>Ich werde immer an dich denken. Mein mutiger, mein reizender Maler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004190_ALPHINAUD<tab>And you mine. Please take care.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... Ich werde Euch auch nie vergessen. Lebt wohl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004200_SETO<tab>Is that...Ardbert's crystal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004200_SETO<tab>Oh, ist das etwa Ardberts Kristall?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004210_SETO<tab>So it is. It has changed...but I would know it anywhere. However did you come by it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004210_SETO<tab>Er fühlt sich<var 1D /var>... anders an. Sag, was ist geschehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004220_SETO<tab>...Then even in death, his enemies found a way to profit from his sacrifice. It grieves me to think of his body being used for evil ends...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004220_SETO<tab>Was für ein unwürdiges Schauspiel<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004230_SETO<tab>But thanks to you, his honor is restored, and he may finally find peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004230_SETO<tab>Nur gut, dass du dem Spuk ein Ende bereitet und damit Ardberts Ehre gerettet hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004240_SETO<tab>No words can express my gratitude. I will keep this crystal safe to the end of my days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004240_SETO<tab>Ich danke dir! Den Kristall nehme ich gerne in meine Obhut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004250_SETO<tab>Rest easy, my friend. You have earned it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004250_SETO<tab>Ruhe in Frieden, Ardbert. Du hast es dir verdient<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tell me, does anything strike you as different about my soul?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Kannst du meine Seele spüren?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Close your eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Seto, schließe deine Augen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004260_SETO<tab>Your soul? Hm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004260_SETO<tab>Deine Seele? Hm<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004270_SETO<tab>Pardon? ...Hm! Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004270_SETO<tab>Hm? Also gut<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004280_SETO<tab>How can this be?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004280_SETO<tab>Aber<var 1D /var>... das kann doch nicht sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Seto, my old friend. You've grown!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Seto, du bist wirklich groß geworden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004300_SETO<tab>Oh! Oh, Ardbert! How I've missed you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004300_SETO<tab>Ardbert<var 1D /var>... Ich habe dich ja so vermisst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004310_SETO<tab>I'm sorry I couldn't keep you safe... Or even console you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004310_SETO<tab>Verzeih mir, dass ich nicht für dich da war, als du mich am dringendsten brauchtest. Verzeih, dass ich dich nicht beschützen konnte!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004320_SETO<tab>Had I only learned to speak sooner, I would have told you how much you meant to me. How much I cared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004320_SETO<tab>Hätte ich doch bloß früher den Mut gefunden, dir zu sagen, wie viel du mir bedeutest, wie sehr ich mir wünsche, dass du glücklich bist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I knew. I always knew.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Das weiß ich. Ich wusste es schon immer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But I'm happy to hear it nonetheless. Thank you, Seto. My partner in crime.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich danke dir, mein treuer Freund<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004350_SETO<tab>I see... His journey continues.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004350_SETO<tab>Seine Reise ist also noch nicht zu Ende<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004360_SETO<tab>Then I will not yet bid him rest. With you, he may look forward to many more adventures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004360_SETO<tab>Dann ist dies auch kein Lebewohl. Möge er dich noch eine lange, lange Zeit auf deinen Wegen begleiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004370_SETO<tab>It has been a while since last I flew. Perhaps I too will go on a little adventure. Ride the winds, seek the horizon... Yes. I think perhaps I will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004370_SETO<tab>Vielleicht sollte ich es öfter so machen wie früher. Einfach losfliegen, einfach vom Wind treiben lassen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004380_RUNAR<tab>Master Matoya!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004380_RUNAR<tab>Matoya!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004390_RUNAR<tab>For too long, I have remained silent. But no longer. I could not bear it if you were to leave. Please stay! I beg of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004390_RUNAR<tab>Matoya, nein<var 1D /var>... Sag es nicht, ich bitte dich. Sag nicht, dass du fortmusst. Ich will, dass du bleibst. Hier, bei mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004400_YSHTOLA<tab>Runar... Please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004400_YSHTOLA<tab>Ach Runar<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004410_RUNAR<tab>...I jest. At least in part. Ahem. What I came to say is this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004410_RUNAR<tab>Verzeih, ich konnte es mir einfach nicht verkneifen, auch wenn ich dich damit in Verlegenheit bringe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004420_RUNAR<tab>Thank you. Without your wisdom, your strength, and your kindness to guide us, our people would still be lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004420_RUNAR<tab>Matoya, wir, die Untertanen der Nacht, haben dir so viel zu verdanken. Mit deiner Weisheit, Stärke und Güte hast du uns wieder auf die Beine geholfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004430_RUNAR<tab>We will never forget you, Master Matoya. Wherever your journeys may take you, you will always be in our hearts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004430_RUNAR<tab>Wir werden die Hexe Matoya niemals vergessen. Ich werde dich niemals vergessen. Pass gut auf dich auf<var 1D /var>... in dieser anderen Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004435_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004435_YSHTOLA<tab>(Schnauben, kleiner Lacher)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004440_YSHTOLA<tab>And you in mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004440_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich werde euch wirklich vermissen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004450_YSHTOLA<tab>Remember that your people's journey─that <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> people's journey is yet ongoing. Your lives will change, and so too will your dreams. Yet come what may, you need not forsake your time-honored traditions, nor less your beliefs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004450_YSHTOLA<tab>Denk daran: Die Gebete der Untertanen der Nacht enthalten die Weisheit eurer Vorfahren. Nehmt sie euch zu Herzen, auch wenn sich die Dinge manchmal im Lauf der Zeit ändern mögen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004460_YSHTOLA<tab>But neither should you be beholden to them. For it was with curiosity and courage that the Night's Blessed first triumphed over adversity. New knowledge and new wisdom are ever worthy of pursuit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004460_YSHTOLA<tab>Aber bleibt stets wissbegierig und vergesst dabei nicht, euren eigenen Kopf zu benutzen. Darin liegt das Geheimnis, die Heraus<var 16 /var>forde<var 16 /var>rungen des Lebens zu meistern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004470_RUNAR<tab>Indeed they are. And so, until we return to the sunless sea, we shall endeavor to live our lives to the fullest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004470_RUNAR<tab>Wir werden es uns jeden Tag aufs Neue zu Herzen nehmen, versprochen. Bis unsere Seelen Teil des dunklen Himmelsmeeres werden und als Sterne auf unsere Nachfahren herabfunkeln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004480_YSHTOLA<tab>That is well. But however great your strides, there may yet come a day when the challenges you face cannot be surmounted alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004480_YSHTOLA<tab>Eine weise Entscheidung<var 1D /var>... Aber bedenke stets, dass es auch Heraus<var 16 /var>forde<var 16 /var>rungen gibt, die man selbst mit vereinten Kräften nicht bewältigen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004490_YSHTOLA<tab>On such a day...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004490_YSHTOLA<tab>Und falls ihr einmal nicht mehr weiterwisst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004500_RUNAR<tab>On such a day?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004500_RUNAR<tab>Was sollen wir dann tun, Matoya?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004505_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004505_YSHTOLA<tab>(Schnauben, kleiner Lacher)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004510_YSHTOLA<tab>You may call on me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004510_YSHTOLA<tab>Ist doch klar: Dann ruft ihr mich natürlich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004520_YSHTOLA<tab>Since a means to travel between worlds exists, you can be sure I will find a way to employ it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004520_YSHTOLA<tab>Schließlich bin ich die Hexe Matoya! Ich werde schon einen Weg finden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004530_YSHTOLA<tab>And there remain so many mysteries here that want for solving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004530_YSHTOLA<tab>Außerdem gibt es hier auch noch das eine oder andere Geheimnis zu lüften<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004540_RUNAR<tab>Master Matoya!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004540_RUNAR<tab>Ach, Matoya!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004550_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004550_YSHTOLA<tab>He, lass mich wieder runter!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004560_ALISAIE<tab>That's everyone, then. We've all said what we needed to.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004560_ALISAIE<tab>Ah, damit sind wir vollzählig. Und ich glaube, wir konnten uns alle von unseren Freunden hier verabschieden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004570_URIANGER<tab>Even as we speak, Beq Lugg undertaketh their final inspection of our spirit vessels.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004570_URIANGER<tab>Beq Lugg bereitet gerade unsere Wesenskristalle vor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004580_URIANGER<tab>When thine own preparations for the journey are complete, thou art to present thyself in the Ocular.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004580_URIANGER<tab>Er hat uns gebeten, ihn im Kristallturm aufzusuchen, sobald wir alle bereit für die Rückreise sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004590_RYNE<tab>Um...everyone?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004590_RYNE<tab>Wenn<var 1D /var>... Wenn ich noch etwas sagen darf<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004600_RYNE<tab>I want to thank you all. On behalf of the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004600_RYNE<tab>Ich möchte euch von Herzen danken, für alles, was ihr getan habt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004610_RYNE<tab>You, and Minfilia, and the Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004610_RYNE<tab>Minfilia bewahrte Norvrandt vor der Lichtflut. Der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch gab uns Hoffnung. Und <var 08 E905 ((die Kriegerin)) ((der Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit führte uns zum Sieg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004620_RYNE<tab>Without each and every one of you guiding us, fighting for us...we wouldn't be standing here now. There wouldn't even <var 1A 02 /var>be<var 1A 01 /var> a here. And no words can express our gratitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004620_RYNE<tab>Was ihr alle für uns getan habt, lässt sich kaum in Worte fassen. Ohne euch gäbe es diese Welt überhaupt nicht mehr!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004630_RYNE<tab>We still have a lot to do, countless trials to overcome─but if it ever seems too much, I'll think of our time together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004630_RYNE<tab>Was auch immer die Zukunft bringen mag, ich werde mich immer an unsere gemeinsame Zeit erinnern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004640_RYNE<tab>The happy moments...and the sad─I will remember it all. And it will give me the strength to carry on without you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004640_RYNE<tab>Wie wir zusammen kämpften, lachten und litten<var 1D /var>... alles, einfach alles! Das wird mir Kraft geben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004650_RYNE<tab>Because you made me who I am. Minfilia. Ryne.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004650_RYNE<tab>Ich war Minfilia, das Orakel des Lichts<var 1D /var>... Und nun bin ich Ryne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004660_RYNE<tab>To honor these names and these memories, I will stand with all the people of this land, and strive for a better tomorrow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004660_RYNE<tab>Ich werde diese Namen und alles, was ich mit ihnen verbinde, für immer mit Stolz in meinem Herzen tragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004670_URIANGER<tab>Thancred. I believe the honor of responding should rightfully be thine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004670_URIANGER<tab>Thancred<var 1D /var>... Ich glaube, dieser Moment gehört dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004680_THANCRED<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004680_THANCRED<tab>ハ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004690_THANCRED<tab>I know better than most how much you've grown, and I have every confidence you'll make your people proud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004690_THANCRED<tab>Du hast dich ganz schön gemacht<var 1D /var>... Egal welche Heraus<var 16 /var>forde<var 16 /var>rungen dich erwarten, du<var 1D /var>... du wirst sie meistern, da habe ich keine Zweifel. Denn niemand ist so stark wie du.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004700_THANCRED<tab>Gods know, I'm proud of you. I always will be. You deserve all the happiness in the world and more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004700_THANCRED<tab>Egal unter welchem Himmel<var 1D /var>... Ich werde immer an dich denken. Immer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004710_RYNE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004710_RYNE<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004720_LYNA<tab>(-???-)Might we also say a few words?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004720_LYNA<tab>(-???-)Ich hoffe, wir stören nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Why, this is...just about all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>... seid ihr alle extra für uns gekommen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004740_LYNA<tab>To see you off seemed the least we could do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004740_LYNA<tab>Wir werden euch niemals angemessen danken können, aber zumindest wollen wir uns gebührlich verabschieden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004750_LYNA<tab>You risked your all for us─fought for a realm not your own. Before you came, we had never known the beauty of the night sky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004750_LYNA<tab>Für euren Heldenmut und eure Selbstlosigkeit im Kampf gegen das Licht gebührt euch höchster Respekt. Nicht nur habt ihr uns in einer ausweglosen Situation vor dem sicheren Untergang bewahrt, ihr habt uns auch die Schönheit der Nacht wiedergebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004760_LYNA<tab>Or the joy of your company.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004760_LYNA<tab>Viele Schlachten haben wir gemeinsam geschlagen, so manchem Feind getrotzt. Das schweißt zusammen. Schmiedet Freund<var 16 /var>schaften. Sie helfen einem, das Leben und jeden Tag in einem neuen Licht zu betrachten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004770_LYNA<tab>Though it saddens us deeply to bid you farewell, it has ever been our way to send off friends with a smile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004770_LYNA<tab>Wir werden erhobenen Hauptes in den Morgen schreiten, wie wir es in Crystarium schon immer getan haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004780_LYNA<tab>Wherever your road should lead, we shall pray for your safety. And following your brave example, we shall continue to fight for the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004780_LYNA<tab>Deshalb werden wir weder zaudern noch verzagen, nein, wir werden eurem Beispiel folgen. Wir werden zusammenstehen und voller Zuversicht in die Zukunft blicken! Lebt wohl, Freunde. Unsere Gebete werden euch begleiten, wo immer ihr auch sein mögt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004790_ALISAIE<tab>With or without us, you've always taken good care of this city. I don't doubt for a moment you'll continue to do so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004790_ALISAIE<tab>Auf die Bürger von Crystarium ist Verlass. Das wissen wir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aye, a more resilient people we have never known.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja, diese Stadt kriegt so schnell niemand klein. Außerdem<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004810_ALPHINAUD<tab>As resilient and enduring as the tower that watches over you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Außerdem<var 1D /var>... wacht ein strahlendes Symbol der Hoffnung über euch. Eines, das euch sagt: Ihr seid nie allein<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004820_LYNA<tab>To the last, we did not question the Exarch about his past. It is only now, when he can no longer tell us, that we believe we know the answer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004820_LYNA<tab>Der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch hat aus seiner Herkunft immer ein Geheimnis gemacht. Aber jetzt liegt die Antwort vor uns.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004830_LYNA<tab>We have heard what became of him, and what is about to be attempted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004830_LYNA<tab>Ich habe gehört, was mit ihm passiert ist. Wie mag es ihm jetzt gehen - seiner Seele<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004840_LYNA<tab>All will be well, of this we are certain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004840_LYNA<tab>Alles wird gut werden, ganz bestimmt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004850_LYNA<tab>How could it be otherwise, when every soul in the Crystarium is praying for it with all their heart?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004850_LYNA<tab>Wir<var 1D /var>... alle Bewohner von Crystarium, glauben ganz fest daran.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004860_LYNA<tab>And so, when our lord awakens, I bid you give him a message.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004860_LYNA<tab>Bitte richte dem Exarchen etwas aus, wenn er erwacht<var 1D /var>... und sich an uns erinnert<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004870_LYNA<tab>Tell him he needn't worry about us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004870_LYNA<tab>Bitte sag ihm, er soll sich um uns keine Sorgen machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004880_LYNA<tab>That he need no longer hide who he truly is. That he should live his own life to the fullest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004880_LYNA<tab>Sag ihm, dass er sich nun nicht mehr verstellen braucht, dass die Last der Verantwortung von seinen Schultern genommen ist. Und dass er nun sein Leben in vollen Zügen genießen soll<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004890_LYNA<tab>And that if he should ever find himself reminiscing on the past with a smile, we shall be smiling with him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004890_LYNA<tab>Wenn er sich eines Tages an uns erinnert und herzlich über die Dinge lacht, die geschehen sind, dann kann er sich sicher sein, dass wir ihn hören und voller Glück mit einstimmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004900_LYNA<tab>Will you tell him this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004900_LYNA<tab>Wirst du ihm das ausrichten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Word for word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Das werde ich, Lyna. Das werde ich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll do my best.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wenn sich die Gelegenheit ergibt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004910_LYNA<tab>Thank you. Please look after him for us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004910_LYNA<tab>Danke! Das stimmt mich froh.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004920_LYNA<tab>I am sure you will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004920_LYNA<tab>Ich glaube fest daran, dass es so kommen wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004930_YSHTOLA<tab>I daresay we have all the good wishes we can carry. Let us be on our way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004930_YSHTOLA<tab>Es wird sich alles fügen, da bin ich sicher. Ich glaube, es wird Zeit, dass wir uns auf den Weg machen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004940_BEQLUGG<tab>All right, then. Pray proceed as instructed, beginning with your memories.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004940_BEQLUGG<tab>Wohlan, fokussiert eure Erinnerungen, so wie ich es euch erklärt habe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004950_URIANGER<tab>The first step is complete. And all appeareth to be in order.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004950_URIANGER<tab>Der erste Schritt wäre getan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004960_ALISAIE<tab>Well, that just leaves our souls, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004960_ALISAIE<tab>Dann folgt nun die Seele.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004970_ALISAIE<tab>We're in your hands, Angelo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004970_ALISAIE<tab>Angel, jetzt bist du dran.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004980_BEQLUGG<tab>It is done! The vessels have received of both their memories and their souls!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004980_BEQLUGG<tab>Geschafft! Ihre seeligen Seelen und Erinnerungen sind nun in den Wesenskristallen gespeichert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004990_BEQLUGG<tab>I hereby entrust them to your care. They belong to you now. Just be sure to guard them well, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004990_BEQLUGG<tab>Los, sammle sie schnell ein und pass gut darauf auf! Lass sie bloß nicht fallen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005000_RYNE<tab>This <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> work, won't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005000_RYNE<tab>Es wird funktionieren, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005010_BEQLUGG<tab>Our theories have held thus far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005010_BEQLUGG<tab>Das hoffe ich. Solch eine haarig-heikle Weltenreise ist auch für mich neu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005020_BEQLUGG<tab>But I make no promises about what is to come. Even the greatest mages in history knew better than to transport a soul across the rift. We, my dear, are in unknown territory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005020_BEQLUGG<tab>Ich kann nicht garantieren, dass Seelen in eine andere Welt mitgenommen werden können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005030_BEQLUGG<tab>Prepare as we might, we cannot account for all possibilities, and it is in such circumstances that accidents are wont to occur...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005030_BEQLUGG<tab>Weder ich noch die Magier von einst haben alle geheimen Geheimnisse der Seele gelüftet. Fehler geschehen<var 1D /var>... ebenso wie Wunder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005040_BEQLUGG<tab>Yet miracles do happen. So let us pray, and will our friends home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005040_BEQLUGG<tab>Deshalb lass uns beten. Vielleicht dringen unsere guten Wünsche dorthin, wo uns der Zugang verwehrt ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005050_RYNE<tab>I won't stop praying until I know they're safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005050_RYNE<tab>Ja. Ich werde beten, dass alles gut geht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005060_BEQLUGG<tab>All safely stowed away? I do hope so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005060_BEQLUGG<tab>Gut. Wie ich sehe, hast du alle Kristalle eingesammelt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005070_BEQLUGG<tab>All that remains, then, is to step into the mirror. Go now...and safe travels.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005070_BEQLUGG<tab>Dann kannst du nun durch den spiegelnden Spiegel treten und in deine Welt zurückkehren. Er war die ganze Zeit über aktiv und wird dich sicher hinüberbringen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005080_ALISAIE<tab>Did it...? Are we...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005080_ALISAIE<tab>Wo<var 1D /var>... bin ich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005090_THANCRED<tab>...We're home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005090_THANCRED<tab>Wir sind zurück<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005100_TATARU<tab>Oh! Oh, you're back! You're back! You're all back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005100_TATARU<tab>Oooh, einen wunderschönen guten Morgen, meine lieben Freunde!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005110_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005110_YSHTOLA<tab><ATMET TIEF EIN>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005120_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you. My body feels like a sack of popotoes, but otherwise I have never felt better.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005120_YSHTOLA<tab>Danke. Ich fühle mich noch etwas benommen<var 1D /var>... Aber der Plan ist aufgegangen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005130_YSHTOLA<tab>That said, I doubt any of us will be fit to travel for some while. May we leave the rest to you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005130_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich glaube, wir brauchen noch einen Moment, um uns an unsere Körper zu gewöhnen. Kannst du dich um<var 1D /var>... alles weitere kümmern, bis wir uns etwas erholt haben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005140_URIANGER<tab>The vessel beareth our comrade's blood. With it in thy possession, the way will surely open before thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005140_URIANGER<tab>Der Wesenskristall trägt sein Blut. Ich habe keine Zweifel daran, dass er dir das bislang fest verschlossene Portal öffnen wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005150_TATARU<tab>What!? But you've only just got here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005150_TATARU<tab>Huch?! Wo will <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> bloß hin?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005160_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005160_ALPHINAUD<tab>(Freundliches Schnauben)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tataru, might I trouble you to brew us all a pot of your special tea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tataru, sei doch so gut und mach uns deinen großartigen Tee.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah! And we may require an extra cup.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Und bitte rechne mit einem weiteren Gast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yours is a long road, my friend, and it stretches on to places beyond imagining.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Schier endlos ist der Pfad, dem du festen Schrittes folgst. Unbeirrt und unerschrocken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With your every step, these grand adventures shall grow more distant and faint.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>All die Abenteuer, die du bestreitest, werden zu einem Teil deiner Ver<var 16 /var>gangen<var 16 /var>heit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And there may come a day when you forget the faces and voices of those you have met along the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und vielleicht wird mit der Zeit manche Begegnung und manches Erlebnis in Vergessenheit geraten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On that day, I bid you remember this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch ich hoffe, du wirst dich dann noch immer an eines erinnern<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That no matter how far your journey may take you, you stand where you stand by virtue of the road you walked to get there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wie viel Zeit auch vergehen mag<var 1D /var>... Deine Abenteuer haben dich zu <var 08 E905 ((der)) ((dem)) /var> gemacht, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> du bist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For in times of hardship, when you fear you cannot go on...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Welche Schmerzen du auch ertragen, welche Hürden du auch überwinden musst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The joy you have known, the pain you have felt, the prayers you have whispered and answered─they shall ever be your strength and your comfort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das erlebte Glück, die vergossenen Tränen, die Gebete deiner Lieben<var 1D /var>... sie treiben dich an. Und du weißt, du bist nicht allein<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This I hope─I believe, here at memory's end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dieser eine Gedanke ist es, den ich mir bis zum Schluss bewahrte<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005270_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Some days later...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005270_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Einige Tage später<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005280_ALISAIE<tab>[LOW, ANNOYED SIGH]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005280_ALISAIE<tab>Hach<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005290_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is it, Alisaie? Are you all right? Do you still feel under the weather?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Na, liebes Schwesterherz? Wie geht es dir? Hast du dich auch gut erholt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005300_ALISAIE<tab>Physically, I couldn't be better. Thanks to Krile's ministrations, I'm already looking forward to our next fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005300_ALISAIE<tab>Ich fühle mich fast wie neugeboren. Krile hat mich so gut versorgt, dass ich mich direkt ins nächste Abenteuer stürzen könnte!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005310_ALISAIE<tab>But seriously─don't you have anything to say about <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005310_ALISAIE<tab>Schau dir das mal an, Bruderherz. Was für ein Anblick, hm?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005320_YSHTOLA<tab>No less impressive than our garments. You've outdone yourself, Tataru.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005320_YSHTOLA<tab>Die Kleidung ist hervorragend, aber mit den Waffen hast du dich selbst übertroffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005330_TATARU<tab>To give credit where it's due, I had help from a certain fiery pixie who visited me in my dreams. They gave me all the information I needed to get the details just right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005330_TATARU<tab>Hihi, meinst du wirklich? Die Pixie, die mir in meinen Träumen erschienen ist, hat mir eure Ausrüstung in der Splitter<var 16 /var>welt haargenau beschrieben. Bis ins kleinste Detail!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005340_TATARU<tab>For your weapons, though, I needed a <var 1A 02 /var>lot<var 1A 01 /var> more help... Thankfully, our favorite heads of state were happy to place their finest craftsmen at my exclusive disposal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005340_TATARU<tab>Aber ich will ja ehrlich sein. Das ist nicht ganz allein mein Verdienst. Die Waffen sind gar nicht von mir. Die haben die Anführer der Stadt<var 16 /var>staaten netterweise für euch besorgt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005350_TATARU<tab>Oh, and speaking of the Alliance leaders, they all express their “unreserved elation at your safe return,” and promise to come and see you in person as soon as they can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005350_TATARU<tab>Und außerdem soll ich euch etwas von ihnen ausrichten. Ähem! Sie freuen sich sehr über eure Rückkehr und hoffen, euch schon bald wiederzusehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005360_THANCRED<tab>They really needn't have gone to such trouble─but we'll be keeping these gifts all the same. Do pass on our gratitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005360_THANCRED<tab>Na, da haben sie sich ja wirklich nicht lumpen lassen. Bitte sag ihnen, dass wir uns sehr über die Waffen gefreut haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005370_ALISAIE<tab>I realize we haven't taken up new martial arts, nor have I ever been one to set much store by appearances...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005370_ALISAIE<tab>Hm, du und ich, wir haben unseren Kampfstil beibehalten, und die Kleidung gefällt mir eigentlich auch, so wie sie ist<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005380_ALISAIE<tab>But I can't help feeling a certain lack of...I don't know, personal development.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005380_ALISAIE<tab>Aber<var 1D /var>... man sieht uns überhaupt nicht an, wie sehr wir uns weiterentwickelt haben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005390_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Haha.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005400_ALPHINAUD<tab>I quite understand. But as you observed, the others had the more pressing need. Rest assured, our turn will come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ach, das macht doch nichts! Sie benötigen die neue Ausrüstung doch viel dringender als wir. Unsere Gelegenheit kommt gewiss noch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005410_KRILE<tab>If I expend any more aether, I swear I will blink out of existence. I need a bite to eat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005410_KRILE<tab>Puh bin ich geschafft<var 1D /var>... das war wirklich harte Arbeit. So viel Zauberei macht unglaublich hungrig.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005420_KRILE<tab>Tataru, a cup of tea, if you would be so kind. And something sweet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005420_KRILE<tab>Tataru, bekomme ich bitte auch einen Tee<var 1D /var>... und vielleicht etwas Süßes dazu?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005430_URIANGER<tab>By Mistress Krile's exhausted state, may I assume that the ward hath been restored?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005430_URIANGER<tab>Gehe ich recht in der Annahme, dass unsere talentierte Krile die Barriere erfolgreich wieder<var 16 /var>her<var 16 /var>gestellt hat?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005440_GRAHATIA<tab>(-???-)Indeed. We succeeded in weaving it anew, albeit at a slightly diminished potency than when I had Beq Lugg's assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005440_GRAHATIA<tab>(-???-)Selbst Beq Lugg hätte keine bessere Arbeit leisten können. Sie hat sich mit den neuen Barrieren wirklich übertroffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005450_GRAHATIA<tab>(-???-)It is no cause for concern, though. The tower is not easily reached, never mind breached. And even should some few succeed, their presence won't escape my notice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005450_GRAHATIA<tab>(-???-)Sie sind vielleicht nicht ganz so mächtig wie das Original, aber der Turm ist sicher versiegelt. Und sollte doch mal jemand eindringen, werde ich es gewiss merken.
